item.title: Melanie add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I'm afraid that sometimes you'll play lonely games too. Games you can't win 'cause you'll play against you." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Always do what is right. It will gratify half of mankind and astound the other." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Dave Eggers
item.description: "My head was a condemned church with a ceiling of bats, but I swung from this dark mood to euphoria when I thought about leaving." -- Dave Eggers

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Travel is fatal to prejudice, bigotry, and narrow-mindedness, and many of our people need it sorely on these accounts. Broad, wholesome, charitable views of men and things cannot be acquired by vegetating in one little corner of the earth all one's lifetime." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Jimmy Buffett
item.description: "The right combination of guilt and machismo has sent many a fool out into the jungle when he should have stayed home." -- Jimmy Buffett

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Will Durst
item.description: "The administration says the American people want tax cuts. Well, duh. The American people also want drive-through nickel beer night. The American people want to lose weight by eating ice cream. The American people love the Home Shopping Network because it's commercial-free." -- Will Durst

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "In all matters of opinion, our adversaries are insane." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "Is that a bulletproof vest? See, now that's so insulting. That's like saying I'm not smart enough to shoot you in the head." Eddie DeChooch" -- Janet Evanovich
